001package imagingbook.common.util.progress;
002
003/**
004 * A simple progress monitor that only prints the progress of the monitored target task
005 * to the console.
006 * See {@link ProgressMonitorExample} for a usage example.
007 * 
008 * 
009 * @see ProgressMonitor
010 * @see ProgressReporter
011 * @see ProgressMonitorExample
012 */
013public class ConsoleProgressMonitor extends ProgressMonitor {
014        
015        /**
016         * Constructor.
017         * @param target the task ({@link ProgressReporter}) to be monitored
018         */
019        public ConsoleProgressMonitor(ProgressReporter target) {
020                super(target);
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        public void handleProgress(double progress, long elapsedNanoTime) {
025                System.out.format("progress = %.3f elapsed time = %.2fs\n", progress, elapsedNanoTime / 1.0e9);
026        }
027        
028        @Override
029        public void close() {
030                super.close();
031                System.out.println("done.");
032        }
033
034}
